name: Grimnight Heroes: Survivors
description:
Dracula has unleashed his Undead Minions against the people of Grimnight, and you are their only hope! As one of the last vampire survivors, you must defend the city from Vampires, Zombies, Skeletons and more! Can you survive the night?
• Awesome 16-Bit Graphics
• 4 Action-Packed Stages to Complete
• Tons of Special Abilities, Quests, and Unique Items
• 4 Heroes, all with Unique Abilities
• One-Handed Gameplay
• Controller Support
• Unlockable Game Modes: Extreme and Insane
• Free to Play with 100% Optional Ads
THE GRAVEYARD
You begin your quest in the Graveyard outside of Dracula's Castle. Here you will need to vanquish Vampire Bats, Skeletons, Ghouls and more!
THE CRYPT
After finding a hidden entrance beneath a headstone in the Graveyard, you work your way through the Crypt, defeating Vampire Skulls, Mummies, and Zombies.
THE UNDERWORLD
At the deepest depths of the Earth, you will fight Vampire Spiders, Dragons, and Demons to reach your final destination: Dracula's Castle!
DRACULA'S CASTLE
You've cleared your way, and now enter Dracula's Castle. Here you will fight Vampires, Nosferatu Minions, Gargoyles, and Dracula himself!
What are you waiting for? Download now to defeat hordes of the Undead and become a vampire survivor today!
